name: global.R
content:
library(shiny)
library(shinydashboard)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(tidyr)
library(stringr)
library(ggplot2)
library(munsell)
library(reshape2)
library(sf)
library(rnaturalearth)
library(rnaturalearthdata)
library(visNetwork)
library(igraph)
library(heatmaply)
library(DT)
library(plotly)
library(leaflet)

# --- Configuration & Constants ---

color_palette <- c(
  "#0021A5", "#FA4616", "#22884c", "#56B4E9", "#009E73", "#F0E442", 
  "#D55E00", "#CC79A7", "#999999", "#F0A3FF", "#1CE6FF", "#FF34FF", 
  "#FF4A46", "#008941", "#006FA6", "#A30059", "#FFDBE5", "#7A4900", 
  "#0000A6", "#63FFAC", "#B79762", "#8FB0FF", "#5FFB17", "#F5A9B8"
)

open_access_journals <- c('AGIS', 'G&RS', 'GSIS',  'IJGI', 'JOSIS', 'JAG')

# --- Data Loading (Optimized via RDS) ---

# Load Metadata
journal_meta_path <- file.path("Data/overview.csv")
if(file.exists(journal_meta_path)) {
  journal_meta <- read.csv(journal_meta_path, as.is=TRUE)
} else {
  journal_meta <- data.frame(ID=character(), Journal=character())
}
journal_names <- journal_meta$ID
# Colors
if (length(journal_names) > length(color_palette)) {
  extended_palette <- rep(color_palette, length.out = length(journal_names))
  journal_colors <- setNames(extended_palette, journal_names)
} else {
  journal_colors <- setNames(color_palette[1:length(journal_names)], journal_names)
}

# Load Pre-Aggregated Data
articles_df <- readRDS("Data/articles.rds")
countries_df <- readRDS("Data/countries.rds")
collab_df <- readRDS("Data/collab.rds")
metrics_ranked <- if(file.exists("Data/metrics.rds")) readRDS("Data/metrics.rds") else data.frame(ID=character(), year=integer())

# --- GIS Data ---
world_map <- ne_countries(scale = 110, returnclass = "sf")
